snippet.title: The Unexpected Quest - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Today we're happy to launch The Unexpected Quest on Steam!
There will also be 20% off for the first week, starting today!

Buy it here on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1307670/The_Unexpected_Quest/ 

If you're looking for a relaxing gaming experience and enjoy management or city builder games, then this is a great fit for you!

The Unexpected Quest an adventure game with strategy and management elements in a medieval fantasy setting - drawing inspiration from classics such as Warcraft 3 and The Settlers. Embark on quests, hunt down treasures and manage your resources as you build, battle, cast magic, and brew potions to bring order to a world on the brink of disaster.

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/
